scenes.description: Instrumental transition to the next song.
Moona Hoshinova performs her original song 'Who's Toxic? It's You!'.

subtitles.original: ほら おいで
subtitles.english: Come on, come over here

subtitles.original: 夜はコン・デ・トオラ・ヘーイェイェイェ
subtitles.english: Night is... [phonetic nonsense]

subtitles.original: だんだんノリノリで中々パパパパウ
subtitles.english: Gradually getting in the groove...

subtitles.original: 縁も終わんない 手を叩きな パンパン
subtitles.english: The fate won't end, clap your hands, clap-clap

subtitles.original: さあ 鮮烈に 豪華 煽り倒せ 豪華
subtitles.english: Now, vividly and gorgeously, fan the flames gorgeously

subtitles.original: 一生 懸命 一生 懸命 声 高らかと どどど
subtitles.english: With all your might, with your voice loud and clear

subtitles.original: 無我爛道は どどこどだ
subtitles.english: Where is the path of selflessness?

subtitles.original: 愛流乱万 謳い上げました
subtitles.english: Overflowing with love, I sang it out

subtitles.original: オートマティックに溢れちゃう 本能
subtitles.english: Instincts overflowing automatically

subtitles.original: 脱法 乱闘 時代 ウェイで はしゃげば ええ
subtitles.english: Just have fun in this lawless brawling era

subtitles.original: ラタタタ ウォーニ
subtitles.english: Ra-ta-ta-ta waani

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ラ・リ・ゴ・マ・ショー
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na-na ready go my show

subtitles.original: 万歳 遊ぼうぜ 鼓動 響かせ シャウト シャウト
subtitles.english: Hooray, let's play, make your heartbeat echo, shout, shout

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ラ・リ・ゴ・マ・ショー
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na-na ready go my show

subtitles.original: お成り 感情通りに 八走飛べ シャウト シャウト
subtitles.english: Arriving, fly just as your feelings dictate, shout, shout

subtitles.original: ふわっと あっちゅう間 寄り寄り 寄り 寄り 真っ新な 心臓
subtitles.english: Softly in a blink, closer and closer, a brand new heart

subtitles.original: 喰らっちゃえよ 絶頂
subtitles.english: Take a bite of the peak

subtitles.original: へれべれまに 豪快 限界 ガッコン 食らえ 申して その気持ち 解放
subtitles.english: Grandly, at the limit, take a hit, express it and release those feelings

subtitles.original: 一回 死んで ちょー
subtitles.english: Die once, please

subtitles.original: 蛇腹 ラビ ガッタ 乱れ舞いばや 準備 セット そういや ジャスタ
subtitles.english: Jabara rabbi gatta... [phonetic lyrics]

subtitles.original: ガッタ ガッタ なっちゃいや 全部 丸め だるまみたい 揺蕩うわ
subtitles.english: Getting shaky, rolling it all up, swaying like a Daruma doll

subtitles.original: 蛇腹 ラビ ガッタ 乱れ舞いばや 準備 セット そういや ジャスタ
subtitles.english: Jabara rabbi gatta... [phonetic lyrics]

subtitles.original: ガッタ ガッタ なっちゃいや 恋の バタフライ
subtitles.english: Getting shaky, the butterfly of love

subtitles.original: No escape
subtitles.english: No escape

subtitles.original: 情緒 順てぐり 相生 順てぐり
subtitles.english: Emotion, turn by turn, affection, turn by turn

subtitles.original: 殺されても 止まらない
subtitles.english: Won't stop even if I'm killed

subtitles.original: 衝動に 早信 描いた インブレイク
subtitles.english: Quickly believing the impulse, an in-break drawn

subtitles.original: 廃観 全焼 キル
subtitles.english: View of ruins, total burnout, kill

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ラ・リ・ゴ・マ・ショー
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na-na ready go my show

subtitles.original: ええい 鳴らせ 期限だ 綺麗な 餓鬼 10万
subtitles.english: Hey, let it ring, the time is up, a beautiful brat, 100,000

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ラ・リ・ゴ・マ・ショー
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na-na ready go my show

subtitles.original: 満ちた バズィカ ハー！
subtitles.english: A filled bazooka, ha!

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ラ・リ・ゴ・マ・ショー
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na-na ready go my show

subtitles.original: 万歳 遊ぼうぜ 鼓動 響かせ シャウト シャウト
subtitles.english: Hooray, let's play, make your heartbeat echo, shout, shout

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ラ・リ・ゴ・マ・ショー
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na-na ready go my show

subtitles.original: 喝采 巻き起こす ために セイ
subtitles.english: Say, to stir up applause

subtitles.original: 一切合切 忘れて シャウト シャウト
subtitles.english: Forget every single thing and shout, shout

subtitles.original: 鳴け 右も左も待ったったったったったー
subtitles.english: Cry out, waiting on both left and right

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 健全に
subtitles.english: Ah, healthily

subtitles.original: 断罪は 智は 欲を背負い シャウト シャウト
subtitles.english: Judgment and wisdom, carrying desires, shout, shout

subtitles.original: Your action and your words would never match
subtitles.english: Your action and your words would never match

subtitles.original: You're just a piece of trash, and that's a fact
subtitles.english: You're just a piece of trash, and that's a fact

subtitles.original: Who's toxic? It's you!
subtitles.english: Who's toxic? It's you!

subtitles.original: Okay everyone, this is "Who's Toxic? It's You!"
subtitles.english: Okay everyone, this is "Who's Toxic? It's You!"

subtitles.original: You made me feel that I'm not good enough
subtitles.english: You made me feel that I'm not good enough

subtitles.original: I gave you my best, but you're not impressed
subtitles.english: I gave you my best, but you're not impressed

subtitles.original: It's falls apart, you broke my heart
subtitles.english: It's falls apart, you broke my heart

subtitles.original: You're spreading more lies and lies and lies
subtitles.english: You're spreading more lies and lies and lies

subtitles.original: I had enough, cut it out, I am begging no more
subtitles.english: I had enough, cut it out, I am begging no more

subtitles.original: Sing with me!
subtitles.english: Sing with me!

subtitles.original: It's you the one who spread the words that I am fake
subtitles.english: It's you the one who spread the words that I am fake

subtitles.original: It's you the one who stabbed me right in the back
subtitles.english: It's you the one who stabbed me right in the back

subtitles.original: And now you say that I'm misread
subtitles.english: And now you say that I'm misread

subtitles.original: But I don't even really care anyway
subtitles.english: But I don't even really care anyway

subtitles.original: It's you who did some things but then I took the blame
subtitles.english: It's you who did some things but then I took the blame

subtitles.original: It's you who mess around and do a hits and runs
subtitles.english: It's you who mess around and do a hits and runs

subtitles.original: You made my days a living hell
subtitles.english: You made my days a living hell

subtitles.original: Now I don't care, who's toxic? It's you!
subtitles.english: Now I don't care, who's toxic? It's you!

subtitles.original: Welcome to the Eclipse Breaker!
subtitles.english: Welcome to the Eclipse Breaker!

subtitles.original: Even though you're watching me on the screen,
subtitles.english: Even though you're watching me on the screen,

subtitles.original: but I still want to hear you scream!
subtitles.english: but I still want to hear you scream!

subtitles.original: Can't hear you!
subtitles.english: Can't hear you!

subtitles.original: Can't hear you!
subtitles.english: Can't hear you!

subtitles.original: Can't hear you!
subtitles.english: Can't hear you!

subtitles.original: It's bullshit!
subtitles.english: It's bullshit!

subtitles.original: It's bullshit!
subtitles.english: It's bullshit!

subtitles.original: It's bullshit!
subtitles.english: It's bullshit!

subtitles.original: It's falls apart, you broke my heart
subtitles.english: It's falls apart, you broke my heart

subtitles.original: You're spreading more lies and lies and lies
subtitles.english: You're spreading more lies and lies and lies

subtitles.original: I had enough, cut it out, I am begging no more
subtitles.english: I had enough, cut it out, I am begging no more

subtitles.original: It's you the one who tried to make me go insane
subtitles.english: It's you the one who tried to make me go insane

subtitles.original: It's you who should stop and feel a shame
subtitles.english: It's you who should stop and feel a shame

subtitles.original: I see your lies, it's all in vain
subtitles.english: I see your lies, it's all in vain

subtitles.original: I better just ignore it anyway
subtitles.english: I better just ignore it anyway

subtitles.original: It's you the one who turned my world upside down
subtitles.english: It's you the one who turned my world upside down

subtitles.original: It's you who break the rules and pull me under the bus
subtitles.english: It's you who break the rules and pull me under the bus

subtitles.original: Just go away, that you can't stay
subtitles.english: Just go away, that you can't stay

subtitles.original: Just go to hell
subtitles.english: Just go to hell

subtitles.original: Now tell me why...
subtitles.english: Now tell me why...

subtitles.original: You make me question my reality
subtitles.english: You make me question my reality

subtitles.original: Now I have the lesson learned
subtitles.english: Now I have the lesson learned

subtitles.original: This is all I need to know
subtitles.english: This is all I need to know
